attributes.action: Upgrade Turkey from red list to amber list
attributes.additional_details: The current situation and decision do not reflect a pragmatic and scientific approached for EMA approved double vaccinated  for British expats in Turkey, Turkish residents in the UK and British people who would like to spend their holidays in Turkey.
attributes.background: To upgrade Turkey from red list to amber list based on the current scientific facts

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Remove Turkey from the red list
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587179
